member.name: M:ELMO.ElmoManager.GetMotionStatus(System.Int32@)
member.param: 0:position reached the actual position; 1:position reached actual position but out of position window ; 2:In motion; 3:motor disabled

member.name: M:ELMO.ElmoManager.GetInputBit_1(System.Int32@)
member.summary: Read bit 1 from the input register Use for hall effect test

member.name: M:ELMO.ElmoManager.GetInputBit_2(System.Int32@)
member.summary: Read bit 2 from the input register Use for hall effect test

member.name: M:ELMO.ElmoManager.SetZeroPosition
member.summary: Works only if motor is disabled
